snippet.title: The Tribe Game - Out Now!
snippet.description:
https://www.tribeworld.com/game/

We're excited to announce the exclusive release to Tribeworld of the game, which is now available. The English version for our Tribal brothers and sisters who pre-ordered is rolling out over the next 24 hours and will be followed by the German version over the ensuing days. Other language versions, such as Spanish will be available later in the year.

The game will go on general release on outlets such as Steam towards the end of March/beginning of April and we are grateful to have the opportunity to provide this exclusive availability beforehand.
Depending if a gamer gets involved with all the professions and quests, the estimated running time is between 12-14+ hours.

More soon. #KTDA

© 1999-2023 Cloud 9 Screen Entertainment Group. All rights reserved.

The smash New Zealand cult hit from the turn of the millennium, The Tribe is a drama series set in a world where a mysterious virus has wiped out the world's adults, leaving the remaining kids and teens to create a new world in their own image - whatever that image might be.

Visit us on Tribeworld, the official Tribe website: http://www.tribeworld.com 

🎬 Watch The Tribe 🎬
All 5 seasons of The Tribe have been lovingly remastered for the digital era in High Definition and can now be watched (without any ads) on Cloud 9’s Vimeo channel, to stream and download. The series is also available on many video on demand & streaming platforms and broadcasters (availability varies country to country due to rights and licensing).

The Tribe Series on Vimeo: https://vimeo.com/cloud9screenent/vod_pages 

⭐ Cloud 9 - Home of The Tribe (Official)⭐ 
As well as The Tribe, the Cloud 9 Screen Entertainment Group has produced a portfolio of quality family programming including series such as William Shatner's A Twist in the Tale, The Adventures of Swiss Family Robinson, The Legend of William Tell, The Enid Blyton Adventure Series, The Enid Blyton Secret Series, Atlantis High, Revelations (The Initial Journey), The New Tomorrow, Return to Treasure Island.  Episodes can be watched on the official channel YouTube.com/@thetribe as well as lots of bonus special feature content (availability of titles varies territory by territory due to rights & licensing). For more on the Cloud 9 Screen Entertainment Group please visit http://www.entercloud9.com.

🎧 The Tribe Audiobooks 📖 

Featuring many members of the original cast from the television series returning to reprise their characters and narrate the story, the audiobook dramatisations really bring the story to life in an immersive way with music, sound effects and guest roles.

Tribeworld: https://www.tribeworld.com/audiobooks/
Apple Audiobooks: https://apple.co/45w4ZP6 
Amazon Audible: https://tinyurl.com/thetribeaudible 
Google Play: https://tinyurl.com/ymu86dx5 
Spotify: https://tinyurl.com/32ccdd7c 
Vimeo: http://tinyurl.com/c9tribebooksvimeo

📖 The Tribe Books & Novels 📖
Several books have been released in recent years including the sequel novels that continue the official story after Season 5 (being the equivalent of The Tribe Series 6, 7 and 8).  There is also a behind the scenes memoir, a novelisation of Season 1 and a collector’s edition screenplay book.  Titles are available in English, German and Spanish and in eBook format on all major platforms, as well as physical paperback editions.

Tribeworld: https://www.tribeworld.com/books/ 
Apple Books: https://apple.co/3MUXzxm 
Amazon Kindle: http://bit.ly/thetribebooksAMZ 
Google Play: https://tinyurl.com/2bcyweh9 

🎵 The Tribe Music 🎵
The Tribe Soundtracks Vol 1 & Vol 2 (as well as The Spirit Symphony and music from other Cloud 9 series!) are now available.

Apple Music: https://apple.co/433w5vd 
Spotify: https://spoti.fi/2QKEvoc
YouTube Music: http://tinyurl.com/c9tribemusic
Amazon Music: https://tinyurl.com/3kthmyxu 

🎮The Tribe Video Game🕹

Live and play the adventure in this story-driven RPG for Tribe fans and gamers alike. Customise your character and play your part in the story of the Mall Rats, in a beautifully crafted world. Available from Tribeworld and Steam for Windows PC and MacOS.

http://www.tribeworld.com/game/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1904330/The_Tribe_Game/ 

💬 The Tribe Official Discord Server 💬 Join the official Tribe Discord server to make new friends and discuss all things tribal!

https://discord.gg/E2DsRcfquT 

😀Join  The Tribe on Social Media! 👍 

The Tribe's Official Facebook: https://facebook.com/thetribeofficial 
The Tribe's Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/thetribeseries 
The Tribe's Official Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thetribetvs... 

⭐ Thank you for watching! Keep the Dream Alive...⭐

#TheTribe #tvseries #game
